h7701.definition: or שׁוֹד; (Job 5:21), from {{h7736}}; violence, ravage; desolation, destruction, oppression, robbery, spoil(-ed, -er, -ing), wasting.

h7702.definition: a primitive root; to abrade, i.e. harrow a field; break clods, harrow.

h7703.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be burly, i.e. (figuratively) powerful (passively, impregnable); by implication, to ravage; dead, destroy(-er), oppress, robber, spoil(-er), × utterly, (lay) waste.

h7704.definition: or שָׂדַי; from an unused root meaning to spread out; a field (as flat); country, field, ground, land, soil, × wild.

h7705.definition: from {{h7703}}; a wife (as mistress of the house); × all sorts, musical instrument.

h7707.definition: from the same as {{h7704}} and {{h217}}; spreader of light; Shedejur, an Israelite; Shedeur.

h7708.definition: plural from the same as {{h7704}}; flats; Siddim, a valley in Palestine; Siddim.

h7709.definition: apparently from {{h7704}}; a cultivated field; blasted, field.

h7710.definition: a primitive root; to scorch; blast.

h7712.definition: (Aramaic) a primitive root; to endeavor; labour.

h7713.definition: from an unused root meaning to regulate; a row, i.e. rank (of soldiers), story (of rooms); board, range.

h7714.definition: probably of foreign origin; Shadrak, the Babylonian name of one of Daniel's companions; Shadrach.

h7716.definition: or שֵׂי; probably from {{h7582}} through the idea of pushing out to graze; a member of a flock, i.e. a sheep or goat; (lesser, small) cattle, ewe, goat, lamb, sheep. Compare {{h2089}}.

h7717.definition: from an unused root meaning to testify; a witness; record.

h7718.definition: from an unused root probably mean to blanch; a gem, probably the beryl (from its pale green color); onyx.

h7719.definition: the same as {{h7718}}; Shoham, an Israelite; Shoham.

h7720.definition: from the same as {{h5469}}; a round pendant for the neck; ornament, round tire like the moon.

h7721.definition: from an unused root (akin to {{h5375}} and {{h7722}}) meaning to rise; a rising; arise.

h7722.definition: or (feminine) שׁוֹאָה; or שֹׁאָה; from an unused root meaning to rush over; a tempest; by implication, devastation; desolate(-ion), destroy, destruction, storm, wasteness.

h7723.definition: or שַׁו; from the same as {{h7722}} in the sense of desolating; evil (as destructive), literally (ruin) or morally (especially guile); figuratively idolatry (as false, subjective), uselessness (as deceptive, objective; also adverbially, in vain); false(-ly), lie, lying, vain, vanity.

h7724.definition: from the same as {{h7723}}; false; Sheva, an Israelite; Sheva.

h7725.definition: a primitive root; to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again; ((break, build, circumcise, dig, do anything, do evil, feed, lay down, lie down, lodge, make, rejoice, send, take, weep)) × again, (cause to) answer (  again), × in any case (wise), × at all, averse, bring (again, back, home again), call (to mind), carry again (back), cease, × certainly, come again (back), × consider,   continually, convert, deliver (again),   deny, draw back, fetch home again, × fro, get (oneself) (back) again, × give (again), go again (back, home), (go) out, hinder, let, (see) more, × needs, be past, × pay, pervert, pull in again, put (again, up again), recall, recompense, recover, refresh, relieve, render (again), requite, rescue, restore, retrieve, (cause to, make to) return, reverse, reward,   say nay, send back, set again, slide back, still, × surely, take back (off), (cause to, make to) turn (again, self again, away, back, back again, backward, from, off), withdraw.

h7726.definition: from {{h7725}}; apostate, i.e. idolatrous; backsliding, frowardly, turn away (from margin).

h7727.definition: the same as {{h7726}}; rebellious; Shobab, the name of two Israelites; Shobab.

h7728.definition: from {{h7725}}; apostate, i.e. heathenish or (actually) heathen; backsliding.

h7730.definition: for {{h5441}}; a thicket, i.e. interlaced branches; thick boughs.

h7731.definition: perhaps for {{h7730}}; Shobak, a Syrian; Shobach.

h7732.definition: from the same as {{h7640}}; overflowing; Shobal, the name of an Edomite and two Israelites; Shobal.

h7733.definition: active participle from a primitive root meaning to leave (compare {{h7662}}); forsaking; Shobek, an Israelite; Shobek.

h7734.definition: a primitive root; to retreat; turn back.

h7735.definition: a primitive root; to hedge in; make to grow.

h7736.definition: a primitive root; properly, to swell up, i.e. figuratively (by implication of insolence) to devastate; waste.

h7737.definition: a primitive root; properly, to level, i.e. equalize; figuratively, to resemble; by implication, to adjust (i.e. counterbalance, be suitable, compose, place, yield, etc.); avail, behave, bring forth, compare, countervail, (be, make) equal, lay, be (make, a-) like, make plain, profit, reckon.

h7738.definition: a primitive root; to destroy; × substance (from the margin).

h7739.definition: (Aramaic); corresponding to {{h7737}}; to resemble; make like.

h7740.definition: from {{h7737}}; plain; Shaveh, a place in Palestine; Shaveh.

h7741.definition: from the same as {{h7740}} and the dual of {{h7151}}; plain of a double city; Shaveh-Kirjathajim, a place East of the Jordan; Shaveh Kiriathaim.

h7742.definition: a primitive root; to muse pensively; meditate.

h7743.definition: a primitive root; to sink, literally or figuratively; bow down, incline, humble.

h7744.definition: from {{h7743}}; dell; Shuach, a son of Abraham; Shuah.

h7746.definition: the same as {{h7745}}; Shuchah, an Israelite; Shuah.

h7747.definition: patronymic from {{h7744}}; a Shuchite or descendant of Shuach; Shuhite.

h7748.definition: from {{h7743}}; humbly; Shucham, an Israelite; Shuham.

h7750.definition: or (by permutation) סוּט; a primitive root; to detrude, i.e. (intransitively and figuratively) become derelict (wrongly practise; namely, idolatry); turn aside to.

h7751.definition: a primitive root; properly, to push forth; (but used only figuratively) to lash, i.e. (the sea with oars) to row; by implication, to travel; go (about, through, to and fro), mariner, rower, run to and fro.

h7752.definition: from {{h7751}}; a lash (literally or figuratively); scourge, whip.

h7753.definition: a primitive root; to entwine, i.e. shut in (for formation, protection or restraint); fence, (make an) hedge (up).

h7754.definition: or (feminine) שׂוֹכָה; from {{h7753}}; a branch (as interleaved); bough.

h7755.definition: or שֹׂכֹה; or שׂוֹכוֹ; from {{h7753}}; Sokoh or Soko, the name of two places in Palestine; Shocho, Shochoh, Sochoh, Soco, Socoh.

h7756.definition: probably patronymic from a name corresponding to {{h7754}} (feminine); a Sukathite or descendant of an unknown Israelite named Sukah; Suchathite.

h7757.definition: from an unused root meaning to hang down; a skirt; by implication, a bottom edge; hem, skirt, train.

h7758.definition: or שֵׁילָל; (Micah 1:8), from {{h7997}}; nude (especially bare-foot); by implication, captive; spoiled, stripped.

h7759.definition: from {{h7999}}; peaceful (with the article always prefixed, making it a pet name); the Shulammith, an epithet of Solomon's queen; Shulamite.

h7760.definition: or שִׂים; a primitive root; to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically); × any wise, appoint, bring, call (a name), care, cast in, change, charge, commit, consider, convey, determine,   disguise, dispose, do, get, give, heap up, hold, impute, lay (down, up), leave, look, make (out), mark,   name, × on, ordain, order,   paint, place, preserve, purpose, put (on),   regard, rehearse, reward, (cause to) set (on, up), shew,   stedfastly, take, × tell,   tread down, (over-)turn, × wholly, work.

h7761.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7760}}; command, give, lay, make,   name,   regard, set.

h7762.definition: from an unused root meaning to exhale; garlic (from its rank odor); garlic.

h7763.definition: or שֹׁמֵר; active participle of {{h8104}}; keeper; Shomer, the name of two Israelites; Shomer.

h7764.definition: from an unused root meaning to rest; quiet; Shuni, an Israelite; Shuni.

h7765.definition: patronymic from {{h7764}}; a Shunite (collectively) or descendants of Shuni; Shunites.

h7766.definition: probably from the same as {{h7764}}; quietly; Shunem, a place in Pal; Shunem.

h7767.definition: patrial from {{h7766}}; a Shunammitess, or female inhabitant of Shunem; Shunamite.

h7768.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be free; but used only causatively and reflexively, to halloo (for help, i.e. freedom from some trouble); cry (aloud, out), shout.

h7770.definition: the same as {{h7769}}; Shua, a Canaanite; Shua, Shuah.

h7771.definition: from {{h7768}} in the original sense of freedom; a noble, i.e. liberal, opulent; also (as noun in the derived sense) a halloo; bountiful, crying, rich.

h7772.definition: the same as {{h7771}}; rich; Shoa, an Oriental people; Shoa.

h7774.definition: from {{h7768}}; wealth; Shua, an Israelitess; Shua.

h7776.definition: or שֻׁעָל; from the same as {{h8168}}; a jackal (as a burrower); fox.

h7777.definition: the same as {{h7776}}; Shual, the name of an Israelite and of a place in Palestine; Shual.

h7778.definition: or שֹׁעֵר active participle of {{h8176}} (as denominative from {{h8179}}); a janitor; doorkeeper, porter.

h7779.definition: a primitive root; properly, to gape, i.e. snap at; figuratively, to overwhelm; break, bruise, cover.

h7780.definition: from {{h8210}}; poured; Shophak, a Syrian; Shophach.

h7781.definition: patronymic from {{h8197}}; a Shuphamite (collectively) or descendants of Shephupham; Shuphamite.

h7782.definition: or שֹׁפָר; from {{h8231}} in the original sense of incising; a cornet (as giving a clear sound) or curved horn; cornet, trumpet.

h7783.definition: a primitive root; to run after or over, i.e. overflow; overflow, water.

h7784.definition: from {{h7783}}; a street (as run over); street.

h7785.definition: from {{h7783}}; the (lower) leg (as a runner); hip, leg, shoulder, thigh.

h7786.definition: a primitive root; properly, to vanquish; by implication, to rule (causatively, crown); make princes, have power, reign. See {{h5493}}.

h7787.definition: a primitive root (identical with {{h7786}} through the idea of reducing to pieces; compare {{h4883}}); to saw; cut.

h7788.definition: a primitive root; properly, to turn, i.e. travel about (as a harlot or a merchant); go, singular See also {{h7891}}.

h7789.definition: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of going round for inspection); to spy out, i.e. (generally) survey, (for evil) lurk for, (for good) care for; behold, lay wait, look, observe, perceive, regard, see.

h7790.definition: from {{h7889}}; a foe (as lying in wait); enemy.

h7791.definition: from {{h7788}}; a wall (as going about); wall.

h7793.definition: the same as {{h7791}}; Shur, a region of the Desert; Shur.

h7794.definition: from {{h7788}}; a bullock (as a traveller); bull(-ock), cow, ox, wall (by mistake for {{h7791}}).

h7795.definition: from {{h7786}} in the primitive sense of {{h5493}}; properly, a ring, i.e. (by analogy) a row (adverbially); principal.

h7796.definition: the same as {{h8321}}; a vine; Sorek, a valley in Palestine; Sorek.

h7797.definition: or שִׂישׂ; a primitive root; to be bright, i.e. cheerful; be glad, × greatly, joy, make mirth, rejoice.

h7798.definition: from {{h7797}}; joyful; Shavsha, an Israelite; Shavsha.

h7799.definition: or שׁוֹשָׁן; or שֹׁשָׁן; and (feminine) שׁוֹשַׁנָּה; from {{h7797}}; a lily (from its whiteness), as a flower of architectural ornament; also a (straight) trumpet (from the tubular shape); lily, Shoshannim.

h7800.definition: the same as {{h7799}}; Shushan, a place in Persia; Shushan.
